!Trader Alexandria: Oh, you don't have the items required to buy either the Angel's Bracelet or the Devil's Bracelet. In order to obtain one, you must first bring me *25 Big Red Nimble Fish, 50 Great Codrans*, and *4 Memento Moris, 5 Earth Eggs, 5 Nonliving Nuclei, 3 Dragon Hearts*, and *7,500,000 Adena*.
